title: Hunger nation
brief_description: This flash animation creates a dismal vision of the future. Effective use of repetition, perspective and scale creates the illusion of depth immersing the audience in an apocalyptic world. A skilfully restrained yet multilayered sound design combines with visual composition revealing confident use of the Flash program.
